p: Turkey ovomucoid third domain (OMTKY3) belongs to the family of Kazal-type inhibitors and normally inactivates serine proteases of the S1A fold that prefer a neutral P1 residue. Exchange of A15-C-T-L18 to R15-C-L-R18 in its reactive site loop leads to a moderate furin inhibitor with an association constant K a of 1.1 × 10 7 M −1 (Lu et al. 1993), which roughly corresponds to a reciprocal dissociation equilibrium constant of ~90 nM.
